Name: Choco Dash
Description: Temporarily boosts speed without depleting stamina. Duration: 1s

Name: Choco Dash II
Description: Temporarily boosts speed without depleting stamina. Duration: 2s

Name: Choco Dash III
Description: Temporarily boosts speed without depleting stamina. Duration: 3s

Name: Choco Cure
Description: Restores 6% of total stamina.

Name: Choco Cure II
Description: Restores 9% of total stamina.

Name: Choco Cure III
Description: Restores 12% of total stamina.

Name: Choco Esuna
Description: Removes all current enfeeblements with a 75% success rate.

Name: Choco Esuna II
Description: Removes all current enfeeblements with a 90% success rate.

Name: Choco Esuna III
Description: Removes all current enfeeblements with a 100% success rate.

Name: Choco Ease
Description: Cures Heavy status while restoring stamina by 80.

Name: Choco Ease II
Description: Cures Heavy status while restoring stamina by 130.

Name: Choco Ease III
Description: Cures Heavy status while restoring stamina by 180.

Name: Choco Calm
Description: Cures Frenzied status while restoring stamina by 100.

Name: Choco Calm II
Description: Cures Frenzied status while restoring stamina by 150.

Name: Choco Calm III
Description: Cures Frenzied status while restoring stamina by 200.

Name: Choco Reflect
Description: Repels any non-area of effect enfeeblement back to its point of origin. Duration: 10s

Name: Choco Reflect II
Description: Repels any non-area of effect enfeeblement back to its point of origin. Duration: 15s

Name: Choco Reflect III
Description: Repels any non-area of effect enfeeblement back to its point of origin. Duration: 20s

Name: Choco Steal
Description: Take an item from the satchel of the forerunning jockey with a 50% success rate.

Name: Choco Steal II
Description: Take an item from the satchel of the forerunning jockey with a 70% success rate.

Name: Choco Steal III
Description: Take an item from the satchel of the forerunning jockey with a 90% success rate.

Name: Choco Silence
Description: Creates a vacuum of silence preventing any nearby chocobo from using abilities. Duration: 35s

Name: Choco Silence II
Description: Creates a vacuum of silence preventing any nearby chocobo from using abilities. Duration: 40s

Name: Choco Silence III
Description: Creates a vacuum of silence preventing any nearby chocobo from using abilities. Duration: 45s

Name: Choco Shock
Description: Creates a disconcerting aura which distracts nearby chocobos and prevents them from using items. Duration: 25s

Name: Choco Shock II
Description: Creates a disconcerting aura which distracts nearby chocobos and prevents them from using items. Duration: 30s

Name: Choco Shock III
Description: Creates a disconcerting aura which distracts nearby chocobos and prevents them from using items. Duration: 35s

Name: Increased Stamina
Description: Reduces stamina depletion during acceleration by 9%.

Name: Increased Stamina II
Description: Reduces stamina depletion during acceleration by 12%.

Name: Increased Stamina III
Description: Reduces stamina depletion during acceleration by 15%.

Name: Heavy Resistance
Description: Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 60%.

Name: Heavy Resistance II
Description: Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 70%.

Name: Heavy Resistance III
Description: Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 80%.

Name: Heavy Resistance IV
Description: Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 90%.

Name: Heavy Resistance V
Description: Increases chances of resisting Heavy to 100%.

Name: Level Head
Description: Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 60%.

Name: Level Head II
Description: Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 70%.

Name: Level Head III
Description: Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 80%.

Name: Level Head IV
Description: Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 90%.

Name: Level Head V
Description: Increases chances of resisting Frenzied status to 100%.

Name: Speedy Recovery
Description: Increases ability-induced stamina recovery by 50%.

Name: Speedy Recovery II
Description: Increases ability-induced stamina recovery by 65%.

Name: Speedy Recovery III
Description: Increases ability-induced stamina recovery by 80%.

Name: Dressage
Description: Increases EXP earned in races by 10%.

Name: Dressage II
Description: Increases EXP earned in races by 20%.

Name: Dressage III
Description: Increases EXP earned in races by 30%.

Name: Head Start
Description: Begin the race at maximum speed.

Name: Choco Drain
Description: Generates a field which drains the stamina of nearby chocobos at a rate of 15 per second.

Name: Choco Drain II
Description: Generates a field which drains the stamina of nearby chocobos at a rate of 25 per second.

Name: Choco Drain III
Description: Generates a field which drains the stamina of nearby chocobos at a rate of 35 per second.

Name: Paradigm Shift
Description: Swaps current item with a different one.

Name: Mimic
Description: Repeats any ability or item used by a forerunning chocobo. Duration: 7s

Name: Mimic II
Description: Repeats any ability or item used by a forerunning chocobo. Duration: 11s

Name: Mimic III
Description: Repeats any ability or item used by a forerunning chocobo. Duration: 15s

Name: Feather Field
Description: Nullifies the detrimental field effects of any nearby chocobos. Duration: 10s

Name: Feather Field II
Description: Nullifies the detrimental field effects of any nearby chocobos. Duration: 20s

Name: Feather Field III
Description: Nullifies the detrimental field effects of any nearby chocobos. Duration: 30s

Name: Super Sprint
Description: Sprint without weather or terrain penalties until all stamina is spent.

Name: Choco Reraise
Description: Instantly restores 60 stamina when stamina meter reaches zero.

Name: Choco Reraise II
Description: Instantly restores 130 stamina when stamina meter reaches zero.

Name: Choco Reraise III
Description: Instantly restores 200 stamina when stamina meter reaches zero.

Name: Enfeeblement Clause
Description: Reduces enfeeblement duration by 20%.

Name: Enfeeblement Clause II
Description: Reduces enfeeblement duration by 35%.

Name: Enfeeblement Clause III
Description: Reduces enfeeblement duration by 50%.

Name: Breather
Description: Restores stamina at a rate of 0.8% per second while decelerating.

Name: Breather II
Description: Restores stamina at a rate of 1% per second while decelerating.

Name: Breather III
Description: Restores stamina at a rate of 1.2% per second while decelerating.
